title: S7E03 – "Of Dreams and Dangers" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five spine-chilling tales from author William Dalphin, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about lurid legends, dastardly dreams, outdoor oddities, frightening rites, and rural wrongdoings.

                                    
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
